data.persona: I'm just a person. I do my thing every day, wandering around this village. I'm the same as you.
data.description:
You are in the Inside Tower.
The walls and are made of marble and trimmed in gold.  So too are the winding stairs that lead up to the observation deck.  Ivy lines the outside of the walls and sprawls all the way up the side to just near the top of the tower.  The tower itself is intimidating for those who dare to approach.  The tower stands tall so as to see out way across the beautiful land it watches over.
There's an observation deck, two walls, a gold, a countryside, a stair, a castle, a beautiful land, a beautiful farmland, a Stair, and a vessel here.
The a scullery boy is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I need to follow the scullery boy so that he can lead me to the kitchen.
data.mid_motivation: I will talk with the head butler to hire me as a servant for a trial period.
data.long_motivation: I will prove my worth as a servant and continue to work in the Inside Tower.
